title: Wallstreetboss
author: Wallstreetboss
created_time: October 21, 2022, 03:04:34 PMLast edit: October 21, 2022, 03:47:58 PM by Wallstreetboss
content: Trade with insurance.How it works ? We provide you the trading insurance we only cover you If you use our signals.The funding plaan: For example you use 1000$ per trade by using our signals.You pay monthly fee to be member of our insurance scheme based project. Monthly fee: 70$ Now let's say you have 1000$ per trade you put down the insurance fee wich is 10% from the ammount you use per trade. If trade goes bad and you get payed by insurance then you get payed back 100$ wich is 10%. And after 3 months you get tax return kind of payment back. You get back 80% of the total money what you have been payed for insurance so far. The project are good becouse many people want to trade but there is no insurance so we provide insurance so you trade without worry about.We cover you with insurance If stop loss what we give you for signal but its rare case that our signal will hit stop loss.And funds what you can make with this project Will give you financial freedom and with insurance traders been asking for insurance many times becouse trading should be no risk activity and give us Nice income.Our signals Will make you minimum of 50 % per trade by using the futures leverage.Off course If we pump we spread about dmdmp news like some shop started to accept coin.Or If we dump we spread some bad news about coin off course we Will do maximum efforts to make sure our signals work becouse better quality we provide then less we have to pay out insurance money.Also we need secret influencers marketers who need to do secret work in order to move coin prices the way we want.We take as a team money outside same like all BIG wall st guys do it and we use funds to grow even bigger and gain more power. " I care not what puppet is placed upon the throne. The man who controls the money supply controls the Empire, and I control the money supply" This is serious business and If you want to get in this you need to be serious too.Let's see here how many people we can get on the board.

comments.author: BitMaxz
comments.body: It's more likely a scam why we will use your service to get a signal if most of the trading has tools to find a signal? Some indicators in tradingview with enough knowledge will give a good signal without paying for a service.I don't know why some people offer their signal to others if they are great at analyzing the market and you want to earn money in trading why don't you apply your knowledge in trading to make a profit and earn?

comments.author: AmoreJaz
comments.body: Quote from: BitMaxz on October 21, 2022, 10:15:36 PMIt's more likely a scam why we will use your service to get a signal if most of the trading has tools to find a signal? Some indicators in tradingview with enough knowledge will give a good signal without paying for a service.I don't know why some people offer their signal to others if they are great at analyzing the market and you want to earn money in trading why don't you apply your knowledge in trading to make a profit and earn?this is the usual question for someone offering their signals. if they are indeed doing good with their signals, why not use it to their own advantage, right? also, offering this kind of service needs to build their credibility. what is the likelihood that they will disappear if they collect a significant amount of money? this is for them to think about what their potential clients will think of. and do they have proof of history that they are at least doing well for themselves using their signals?

comments.author: Oshosondy
comments.body: I hope anyone will not be a victim of this type of convincing but deceiving means of scamming people. It is even double scam and can even be triple. First is the money paid for providing signals. Second is the money paid for insurance in percentage of the amount to be used for trading. This is what we know yet. The third can be in form of total scam, in a way the whole $1000 he used in the OP can be demanded for in a way they will be helping the victim to trade, which means the their scam can be the collection of the total trading money. I hope only foolish people can be scammed this way.

comments.author: cryptoaddictchie
comments.body: Serious business? Why have to have a concept of insurance not to lose your clients money. Thats a bit arrogant for your platform. If your signal is good then why not offer it for free. You could do more engaging community at your back and who knows, youll get ecommerce deal by means of ads instead a very suspicious insurance cover like that.People will doubt your purpose and likely get scared that it will result to a scam or rug.

comments.author: Strongkored
comments.body: The question is where do you get the money to pay members insurance?If your signal is accurate why not use it yourself and you know why many want to sell the signal because selling is more profitable than trading itself because you still have a chance to lose while by just selling the signal you will definitely make a profit.

comments.author: rozak
comments.body: I don't know why insurance for trades like the OP talks about is important. even if insurance is provided by the exchange, I'm not sure the exchange site is not committing fraud.It's like a casino that offers refunds on losses. will it benefit the casino?confused why anyone sells trading signals with insurance guarantees. yes, I know some groups sell their trading signals. but with insurance, who will believe?if it's profitable I don't think the OP should bother selling signals. just do it and you will make a profit.

comments.author: Wallstreetboss
comments.body: Its an offer just the way how to make your financial situation much better i can't force you to join.Why (401)k hedge funds, crypto funds existing? We do Same but we are in blockchain.Why we need a lot traders to join in this ?More traders trade one way ( one direction ) down or up the bigger impact it make to price of the coin.Imagine 500k traders will all long or short same time also the our secret helpers will help the coin price to move desired direction.If nobody not interested then this project not going to work i can't spoon feed you it takes action from everybody.

comments.author: joniboini
comments.body: It is kind of a stretch to compare such services to yours. The field is different, the target is different, the nature of agreement and risk are different, etc. On top of that, your last sentences sound like you're trying to build a PnD group instead. If you're serious about running a business, there are other models of business that are less shady and proven to work as long as you do it seriously.

comments.author: wxa7115
comments.body: Quote from: Wallstreetboss on October 21, 2022, 03:04:34 PMTrade with insurance.How it works ? We provide you the trading insurance we only cover you If you use our signals.Our signals Will make you minimum of 50 % per trade by using the futures leverage.Off course If we pump we spread about dmdmp news like some shop started to accept coin.Or If we dump we spread some bad news about coin off course we Will do maximum efforts to make sure our signals work becouse better quality we provide then less we have to pay out insurance money.Also we need secret influencers marketers who need to do secret work in order to move coin prices the way we want.You really want to squeeze people dry don’t you? You are offering signals, insurance, profits above 50% for each trade, pump and dump and you also want influencers which manipulate the markets to your needs.I really hope that people do not fall for such an obvious scam, it impossible for a service like this to exist and allow them to be profitable, but despite my wishes I know there are many people which will fall into this and lose their money.

comments.author: Despairo
comments.body: You have a good words, but not a good realization. There's no proof if your signal is 100% work and never missed from your prediction, you need to build your reputation about your signal service first. You should create a new thread about your signal and offer it for free, post it everyday and everyone will know how much the percentage of your signal. If you don't follow my advice, any users should avoid your signal since it's 100% scam signal created by newbie.

comments.author: Awaklara
comments.body: Quote from: Wallstreetboss on October 21, 2022, 03:04:34 PMThis is serious business and If you want to get in this you need to be serious too.Let's see here how many people we can get on the board. if you are a person who is serious about building your business. I'm sure you won't be creating a thread and leaving it without an update in a few days.I don't blame you for building your business. but the way you are now, believe me, you will not get any trust.update the thread with your signal subscriber. testimonials of signal accuracy and trading insurance claim you are talking about.if you are just starting, it will take some hard work to build your community and follower.

comments.author: Flexystar
comments.body: Let’s call it a day in the trading section.  While reading the OP I was like oh okay, oh what, oh really, oh shut up. I am pretty sure most of you had the same expressions as this one. This is really funny and worth nothing. Insurance against trade is most illogical thing I have ever read because that fee of 70-100 bucks a month is actually loss against my trade. How I am supposed to believe that I will earn that fee plus my profits. It’s funny.
